features.name: ColdBootNotification
features.title: Cold Boot Charging Station
features.objective: The objective of this use case is to enable a Charging Station that is powering up to register itself at a CSMS and provide the right state information.
features.description: This use case describes how the CSMS can control which Charging Stations access it. To be able to control Charging Stations connecting to a CSMS, Charging Stations are required to send BootNotificationRequest. This request contains some general information about the Charging Station

features.name: ColdBootNotificationPending
features.title: Cold Boot Charging Station - Pending
features.objective: This use case describes the behavior of the CSMS and a Charging Station when the Charging Station is informed by the CSMS that it is not yet accepted using the Pending status.
features.description: This use case describes the behavior of the CSMS and a Charging Station when the Charging Station is informed by the CSMS that it is not yet accepted using the Pending status.
